sentences.en: " Yes , please. I'd like some suction cup. "
sentences.cn: 是的. 我想买几个吸盘.

sentences.en: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children.
sentences.cn: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸婴幼儿的口鼻.

sentences.en: Dirt and dust are drawn into a vacuum cleaner by suction.
sentences.cn: 污物和灰尘被吸入吸尘器.

sentences.en: Dustbags act as a filter and suction will be reduced if they are too full.
sentences.cn: 集尘袋起着过滤的作用，所集的灰尘太多时其吸附作用就会减小。

sentences.en: In nonshrinking soils, the capillary potential derived mainly from capillary suction.
sentences.cn: 在非收缩的土中, 毛细水势主要用毛细水吸力来推导.

sentences.en: Michael was showing the nurse how to suction his saliva.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔正给护士示范如何把他的唾液吸出来。

sentences.en: My anchor is now lying above the suction, in the open lake.
sentences.cn: 锚就放在河口的水泵上.

sentences.en: My vacuum cleaner has very good suction.
sentences.cn: 我的真空吸尘器吸力很强。

sentences.en: Reconnect main lumen to suction source.
sentences.cn: 请将主腔管道连接吸引源.
有些泵是用吸力工作的.

sentences.en: Some suction is provided by the ejector scrubber and the tail gas fan.
sentences.cn: 喷射洗涤器和尾气排风机可提供部分吸力.

sentences.en: To suction with a bulb syringe, push bulb in with your thumb.
sentences.cn: 用球吸引器时先用拇指把球压扁.
真空吸尘器靠抽吸除尘。

sentences.en: We'll get the water out with a suction pump.
sentences.cn: 我们将用抽水机把水抽出来.

sentences.en: With contaminated hand, turn the child's head to right side to suction left bronchus.
sentences.cn: 用已污染的手将小儿的头部转向右侧以吸引左侧支气管.

sentences.en: YHB series chemical submersible pump is vertical single stage single - suction centrifugal pump.
sentences.cn: YHB系列化工液下泵是立式单级单吸离心泵.

phrases.tran_cn: 吸引高度；吸入水头，负压水头
抽吸机；吸尘机；吸痰器；气吸式捡拾机
吸起泵；吸入压力；吸入泵

trans.tran_en: the process of removing air or liquid from an enclosed space so that another substance is sucked in, or so that two surfaces stick together
